verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

צַו֮ <S%H6680><s%> Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> that they give לַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites מִֽנַּחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> of the inheritance אֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <S%H272><s%> of their possession עָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> cities לָשָׁ֑בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell in וּמִגְרָ֗שׁ <S%H4054><s%> suburbs לֶֽעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> for the cities סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> round about תִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and ye shall give לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> [also] unto the Levites

וְהָי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הֶֽעָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> And the cities לָהֶ֖ם לָשָׁ֑בֶת <S%H3427><s%> shall they have to dwell in וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <S%H4054><s%> and the suburbs יִהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be for לִבְהֶמְתָּם֙ <S%H929><s%> of them shall be for their cattle וְלִרְכֻשָׁ֔ם <S%H7399><s%> and for their goods וּלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and for all חַיָּתָֽם׃ <S%H2416><s%> and for all their beasts

וּמִגְרְשֵׁי֙ <S%H4054><s%> And the suburbs הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> of the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites מִקִּ֤יר <S%H7023><s%> [shall reach] from the wall הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city וָח֔וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> and outward אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וּמַדֹּתֶ֞ם <S%H4058><s%> And ye shall measure מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> from without לָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> the city אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side קֵ֣דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> on the east אַלְפַּ֪יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֟ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side נֶגֶב֩ <S%H5045><s%> and on the south אַלְפַּ֨יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand בָּאַמָּ֜ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֣ם ׀ <S%H3220><s%> and on the west אַלְפַּ֣יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֗ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> פְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפ֛וֹן <S%H6828><s%> and on the north אַלְפַּ֥יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand בָּאַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְהָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city בַּתָּ֑וֶךְ <S%H8432><s%> [shall be] in the midst זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> This יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall become לָהֶ֔ם מִגְרְשֵׁ֖י <S%H4054><s%> this shall be to them the suburbs הֶעָרִֽים׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the cities

וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> And among the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> [there shall be] six עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <S%H4733><s%> for refuge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתְּנ֔וּ <S%H5414><s%> which ye shall appoint לָנֻ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> that he may flee שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> for הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <S%H7523><s%> for the manslayer וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> addition תִּתְּנ֔וּ <S%H5414><s%> thither and to them ye shall add אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> cities

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> [So] all the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> to the Levites אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> [shall be] forty וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight עִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> cities אֶתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <S%H4054><s%> them [shall ye give] with their suburbs

וְהֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> And the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> which ye shall give מֵאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <S%H272><s%> [shall be] of the possession בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> הָרַב֙ <S%H7227><s%> from [them that have] many תַּרְבּ֔וּ <S%H7235><s%> ye shall give many וּמֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> הַמְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> but from [them that have] few תַּמְעִ֑יטוּ <S%H4591><s%> ye shall give few אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one כְּפִ֤י <S%H6310><s%> according נַחֲלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5159><s%> to his inheritance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִנְחָ֔לוּ <S%H5157><s%> which he inheriteth יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall give מֵעָרָ֖יו <S%H5892><s%> of his cities לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> When אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> unto them When ye be come over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וְהִקְרִיתֶ֤ם <S%H7136><s%> Then ye shall appoint לָכֶם֙ עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> you cities עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> to be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> of refuge תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֑ם וְנָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> there רֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> for you that the slayer מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> thither which killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <S%H7684><s%> at unawares

וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֧ם הֶעָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> And they shall be unto you cities לְמִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> for refuge מִגֹּאֵ֑ל <S%H1350><s%> from the avenger וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> die הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> that the manslayer עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָמְד֛וֹ <S%H5975><s%> not until he stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> in judgment

וְהֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> And of these cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתֵּ֑נוּ <S%H5414><s%> which ye shall give שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities מִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> shall ye have for refuge תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶֽם׃

אֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three הֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> cities תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> Ye shall give מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side לַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> cities תִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> shall ye give בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> [which] shall be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> of refuge תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [both] for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֤ר <S%H1616><s%> and for the stranger וְלַתּוֹשָׁב֙ <S%H8453><s%> and for the sojourner בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> among תִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> These six הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These לְמִקְלָ֑ט <S%H4733><s%> shall be a refuge לָנ֣וּס <S%H5127><s%> may flee שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anyone מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> them that every one that killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <S%H7684><s%> unawares

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בִּכְלִ֨י <S%H3627><s%> him with an instrument בַרְזֶ֧ל ׀ <S%H1270><s%> of iron הִכָּ֛הוּ <S%H5221><s%> And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> so that he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <S%H7523><s%> he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> the murderer

וְאִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> If בְּאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> a stone יָד֩ <S%H3027><s%> him with throwing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָמ֨וּת <S%H4191><s%> wherewith he may die בָּ֥הּ הִכָּ֛הוּ <S%H5221><s%> And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <S%H7523><s%> he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> the murderer

א֡וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or בִּכְלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> weapon עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> of wood יָד֩ <S%H3027><s%> him with an hand אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָמ֨וּת <S%H4191><s%> wherewith he may die בּ֥וֹ הִכָּ֛הוּ <S%H5221><s%> Or [if] he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <S%H7523><s%> he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> the murderer

גֹּאֵ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> The revenger הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> him he יָמִ֖ית <S%H4191><s%> himself shall slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <S%H7523><s%> the murderer בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <S%H6293><s%> when he meeteth ב֖וֹ ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself יְמִיתֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall slay

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בְּשִׂנְאָ֖ה <S%H8135><s%> him of hatred יֶהְדָּפֶ֑נּוּ <S%H1920><s%> But if he thrust אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <S%H7993><s%> or hurl עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and בִּצְדִיָּ֖ה <S%H6660><s%> at him by laying of wait וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that he die

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְאֵיבָ֞ה <S%H342><s%> Or in enmity הִכָּ֤הוּ <S%H5221><s%> smite בְיָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> him with his hand וַיָּמֹ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> that he die מֽוֹת־ <S%H4191><s%> [him] shall surely יוּמַ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death הַמַּכֶּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> he that smote רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <S%H7523><s%> [for] he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גֹּאֵ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> the revenger הַדָּ֗ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood יָמִ֛ית <S%H4191><s%> shall slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <S%H7523><s%> the murderer בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <S%H6293><s%> when he meeteth בֽוֹ׃

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בְּפֶ֥תַע <S%H6621><s%> him suddenly בְּלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without אֵיבָ֖ה <S%H342><s%> enmity הֲדָפ֑וֹ <S%H1920><s%> But if he thrust אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <S%H7993><s%> or have cast עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כְּלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> upon him any thing בְּלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without צְדִיָּֽה׃ <S%H6660><s%> without laying of wait

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אֶ֜בֶן <S%H68><s%> Or with any stone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> him יָמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> wherewith a man may die בָּהּ֙ בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> [him] not רְא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> seeing וַיַּפֵּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> and cast עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> on וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> [it] upon him that he die וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> and [was] not his enemy ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> neither sought רָעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7451><s%> his harm

וְשָֽׁפְטוּ֙ <S%H8199><s%> shall judge הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> Then the congregation בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between הַמַּכֶּ֔ה <S%H5221><s%> between the slayer וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between גֹּאֵ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> and the revenger הַדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> according הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> according to these judgments הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> to these
